radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry of the lumbar spine (L1-4)
radiographic_examinations.findings: Low bone mineral density (BMD 756 mg/cm3; T-3.0, Z-1.3), indicating osteoporosis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Markedly low bone density in relation to bone area (BMDa) has been found.
